pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Variables d'environnementNO_DB_DUMP : if not already existing, preview will be mounted without dump from prod instance, but with demo datas MODULES_WITHOUT_DEMO : list of modules for --without-demo option (modules that will be loaded without demo data) # Dev interaction### lancement en local pour tester le mode interactif : python -m pynestor preview --interactive --up
